Package com.ultreon.mods.lib.core.world.storage.loot

Class LootTableInjection

java.lang.Object
com.ultreon.mods.lib.core.world.storage.loot.LootTableInjection
public class LootTableInjection extends Object
Class for injecting loot data into loot tables. For example a custom entity drop. Or custom items in loot chests etc.

    • modLoc

      public static net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation modLoc(String path)
      Creates a resource location from the mod's loading context. Warning: Use only on the mod's constructor or other places when the mod's loading contexts to the expected mod.
      Parameters:
      path - resource path to the injection.
      Returns:
      resource location object.
      See Also:
      • ModLoadingContext

    • onLootTableLoad

      public static void onLootTableLoad(net.minecraftforge.event.LootTableLoadEvent evt)
      This method injects the loot tables when a loot table gets loaded, this method isn't supposed to get called manually. Use registerInjection(ResourceLocation, String) or registerInjection(ResourceLocation, ResourceLocation) instead.
      Parameters:
      evt - the event for loading loot tables.

    • registerInjection

      public static void registerInjection(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation target, net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation injection)
      Registers a loot table injection, this will load in onLootTableLoad(LootTableLoadEvent)
      Parameters:
      target - the loot table to inject.
      injection - the injection for the loot table.

    • registerInjection

      public static void registerInjection(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation target, String modId)
      Registers a loot table injection, this will load in onLootTableLoad(LootTableLoadEvent)
      Parameters:
      target - the loot table to inject.
      modId - the mod's id to get the injection from.
